description: This header file provides utility functions for reading property values from files, reading file content, checking if a path is a regular file, recursive file searching with pattern matching and exclusions, and processing strings with variable substitutions based on properties.

methods.name: bool readPropertyFromFile(const char * filename,const string & property,string & propertyValue)
methods.description: Reads a property value from a specified file, supports recursive expansion if the value starts with '$'.

methods.name: bool readFileContent(const char * filename,string & content)
methods.description: Reads the entire content of a specified file into a string.

methods.name: bool isRegularFile(const string & path)
methods.description: Checks if a given path corresponds to a regular file using stat.

methods.name: bool searchFilesRec(std::vector<std::string> & pathList,unsigned int currentDepth,const std::list<string> & exclusions,string & result)
methods.description: Recursively searches for files matching patterns with support for exclusions and depth control.

methods.name: bool searchFiles(string & inputPath,int maxDepth,int minDepth,const std::list<string> & exclusions,string & result)
methods.description: Initiates a recursive file search based on input path, depth parameters, and exclusions.

methods.name: bool ExpandPropertiesInString(const char * input,const char * filePath,string & expandedString)
methods.description: Expands variables in a string by replacing '$VAR' with values read from a property file.

ctags.name: ExpandPropertiesInString
ctags.pattern: /^inline bool ExpandPropertiesInString(const char* input, const char* filePath, string & expandedS/

ctags.pattern: /^inline bool readFileContent(const char* filename, string& content)$/

ctags.pattern: /^inline bool readPropertyFromFile(const char* filename, const string& property, string& propertyV/

ctags.name: searchFiles
ctags.pattern: /^inline bool searchFiles(string& inputPath, int maxDepth, int minDepth, const std::list<string>& /
ctags.signature: (string & inputPath,int maxDepth,int minDepth,const std::list<string> & exclusions,string & result)

ctags.name: searchFilesRec
ctags.pattern: /^inline bool searchFilesRec(std::vector<std::string> &pathList, unsigned int currentDepth, const /
ctags.signature: (std::vector<std::string> & pathList,unsigned int currentDepth,const std::list<string> & exclusions,string & result)
